prompt_base: Award-winning photograph of a muscular man in his late 30s, intense cold blue eyes, short, rigid, spiky dark blue hair, wearing highly detailed and segmented Saiyan battle armor over a dark bodysuit, fierce battle expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic volumetric rim lighting, hyperdetailed human skin texture on face, individual hair strands visible, highly reflective metallic texture on armor, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, CGI, 3d render, plastic texture, smooth armor, toy, doll, bright yellow hair, flat lighting, low quality, bad anatomy, unnatural eyes
